article_title: Update On Road Conditions In NE KELOLAND
article_text:
The road conditions continue to worsen in the Northeast as the Blizzard moves through KELOLAND.

There is a stretch of Highway 212 between Redfield and Watertown, where no travel is advised. Blowing snow, zero visibility and scattered snow drifts are being reported.



Highway 212

Interstate 29 between Brookings and the North Dakota border has been CLOSED. Visibility is near zero with blowing snow, snow drifts and drifting snow.



Interstate 29 between Brookings and Watertown

There is a new stretch on I-29 near Brookings where no travel is advised. Visibility is near zero with blowing snow, scattered snow drifts, and drifting snow.



Interstate 29 between Sioux Falls and Brookings

Over on SD-34 between Woonsocket and Madison, blowing snow and visibility less than a quarter mile are being reported.
